title: Looking for something to do in League of Legends? Try Factions!

embed.description: All skill levels are welcome. You can start or join a scored match anytime. Faction versus faction matches tied to a dynamic storyline. Factions is a community-powered League of Legends game mode in which Summoners declare for a faction, such as Noxus or Ionia, and fight matches using faction-specific Champion lists.

body:
Looking for something new to try in League?

Looking for something to do in League?

Want to try a new Game-Mode made and run by the community?

Interested in the Pre-Retcon Lore of the League?

Then you should try [FACTIONS!](http://leaguefactions.net/)

Factions is a cool way to test your skills, by not only limiting rosters, but also matching you with different and interesting people! It has a healthy community, dedicated staff, and it even has its own forums! We have featured matches at weekends, and every friday, we have Factions Friday!

So come visit us, [in the ‘FACTIONS’ chat!](https://leaguefactions.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/joinchatbutton-marked.jpg?w=605)

replies.body: Question: I hear that there are raptors in the Factions community. I am concerned they might attack me. Should I be?
Yes. But only 7 out of 10 attacks leave the victim permanently maimed, so you should be ok.
i have been attacked by one of those raptors, one of the worst things i experienced after beeing attacked by a creatur named gromp? and since that day i have been memed.sad but true story
Are you Chris Pratt?

Oh, and Raptor just made a Factions Friday FAQ bingo card:

http://i.imgur.com/2wKOE8n.png

Recruiting Raptor was such a good idea.

Except I don't think I've ever heard anyone exclaim, "Oh my gosh, it's Cupcake!" in a Factions Friday thread.
OH MY GOSH, IT'S CUPCAKE!
[http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m4e92kJpBm1rp7aeb.gif](http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m4e92kJpBm1rp7aeb.gif)

i want ionia back in the fray, mostly for irelia, but that's besides the point, ionia, needs to put them big boy pants on and attack the shadow isles, the folly of the ruined king, has festered for too long, and ionia, will restore balance.!

Okey danks. Wiki still tells me Blitzcrank's faction is Zaun tho.
Well, she hangs out there, but she's FROM Zaun. Or so the story goes.

Check her champion page!  In her main profile it says:

Jinx
The loose cannon

Zaun
Phew, I'm just trying to figure out everything, (◕︵◕)
Okay. But one thing, stop. Stop advertising this on the Boards. Okay? Okay.
Without any sarcasm I do want to hear any ideas you have for advertising

Advertise to the Reddit page. That group of pages is more of an all around group that can hold really anything. These Boards, while it may not seem like it, are mainly for things about Riot's connection to League and the community. While I'm not saying that Reddit does not connect Riot with the followers, it is hosted on Reddit. This man coming in and advertising his program on the Boards is kind of like advertising Curse Voice or other third party programs on something specifically attuned to things having to do with Riot.
ITS A SUB-COMMUNITY DEDICATED TO THE STORY OF THIS GAME, AND ITS MADE UP OF PLAYERS, WHAT PART OF THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH RIOT? THEY ONLY HAVE 1 GAME MAN,

I don't think it's anything like advertising Teamspeak, the best voice-over program in the world.  (Joking. We all know it's Ventrilo. ;)

It is about community creations, and I think this is a good place for it.  It is, after all, a creation created by the community, for the community.
You have a better solution for getting people to join?
this, is a community, of lol players, if a bronzie has the right to spend an hour complaining about how bad he is, we have every right to promote this.
